akn:section.akn:heading: Transfer of member of Metropolitan Police to Capitol Police â€” Election.

akn:content.akn:p: Any member of the Metropolitan Police force detailed to the Capitol Police (other than the Capitol Police Chief):

In each case in which a member of the Metropolitan Police force transfers to the Capitol Police under subsection (b) of this section, the position occupied by such member immediately before the effective date of such transfer shall, beginning on such date, be a position on the rolls of the Capitol Police for the purpose of providing for the assimilation of such member.
